thread.title: Dr. Stuart Aaronson
thread.title_full: Flologic reviewed by Dr. Stuart Aaronson

author: Dr. Stuart Aaronson
title: Dr. Stuart Aaronson
text:
Please see above:
Courteous and knowledgeable staff. Tried to determine whether the current IR signaling model would be sufficient for distance needed for transmission. However, because of this concern decided to wait until a model with longer frequency transmission is available.
